org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Interface IAeLockManager

All Superinterfaces:
IAeManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractLockManager, AeRecoveryLockManager
public interface IAeLockManager
extends IAeManager

A generic lock manager that provides a means of acquiring and releasing locks based on a unique resource name and hash value.

Nested Class Summary
static interface IAeLockManager.IAeLock
          Value returned from the acquire lock call.
 
Method Summary
 IAeLockManager.IAeLock acquireLock(javax.xml.namespace.QName aQName, int aLockId, int aTimeout)
          Called when a lock needs to be acquired.
 void releaseLock(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
          Called to release a lock that it had previously acquired for a qname and hash value.

accept, create, destroy, getEngine, prepareToStart, setEngine, start, stop
 

Method Detail

acquireLock

public IAeLockManager.IAeLock acquireLock(javax.xml.namespace.QName aQName,
                                          int aLockId,
                                          int aTimeout)
                                   throws AeBusinessProcessException
Called when a lock needs to be acquired. Should always be used in conjunction with the releaseLock method in a finally block.

Parameters:
aQName - Qualified name of the key
aLockId - id of the value we're trying to lock (should be unique w/in the qname provided)
aTimeout - max number of seconds to wait to acquire lock
Returns:
IAeLock The lock that was acquired, should be used in the call to release lock.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException

releaseLock

public void releaseLock(IAeLockManager.IAeLock aLock)
Called to release a lock that it had previously acquired for a qname and hash value.

Parameters:
aLock -
